declare @$lockedDate smalldatetime, @$lockedDateUnit smalldatetime select @$lockedDate = convert(varchar(10), ngay_ks, 111) from dmstt select @$lockedDateUnit = convert(varchar(10), ngay_ks, 111) from dmdvcsks where ma_dvcs = @@unit select 'this._lockedDate = ''' + convert(varchar(10), @$lockedDate, 111) + ''';this._lockedDateUnit = ''' + isnull(convert(varchar(10), @$lockedDateUnit, 111), '') + ''';' as message return
&XMLWhenFilterLoading; &XMLWhenFilterClosing;
